FilterOperator.DESCRIPTION: optional operator to compare value(s), default: eq

FilterOperator2.DESCRIPTION: second optional operator to compare value(s), default: eq

FilterPrefix.DESCRIPTION: rlifilter prefix, if none was passed to the rlifilter object. if a prefix was defined either way, it must be inserted before rlifilter property names: <Prefix>RlicFilter

FilterValue.DESCRIPTION: value to search for in filter

FilterValue2.DESCRIPTION: second set of colon separated values to work on these specific RLI lines only

RlicChapterDepth.DESCRIPTION: name of the RLI column to write the chapter depth of the mail or attachment into

RlicChapterName1.DESCRIPTION: name of the RLI column to write the mail subject or the converted attachment file name into

RlicFilter.DESCRIPTION: name of RLI column for filter

RlicFilter2.DESCRIPTION: name of second RLI column to use to filter specific RLI lines only
